description.@en: Long has the Plague Doktor wandered among the sick and infirm. Both a life-giver and death-dealer, a Plague Doktor is both an omen of death and a portent to life.

effect.@en: You always succeed in Skill Tests to Treat Disease. In addition, any time you Critically Succeed a Skill Test to withstand Disease, you are forever immune to it in the future.
